task.title: Committing an XA transaction branch by using REST Administration APIs
task.shortdesc: System administrators can heuristically commit an XA transaction branch that is in prepared state by using REST Administration APIs.

context.p: You can heuristically commit an XA transaction branch by using a REST Administration API, or by using the . For more information about using the to heuristically commit an XA transaction branch, see .

Change the state of an XA transaction branch only when you are certain that the transaction cannot be resolved by the normal protocols. Changing the state independently of the transaction manager might result in the loss of transactional integrity between and other resource managers involved in the XA transaction.
